SCRIPT.MSCRI:
!Escape arguments :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CONJUR_URL# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CYBERARK_CONJUR.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX :SET &UC4RB_CONJUR_URL# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CONJUR_USERNAME# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CYBERARK_CONJUR.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX :SET &UC4RB_CONJUR_USERNAME# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CONJUR_ACCOUNT# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CYBERARK_CONJUR.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX :SET &UC4RB_CONJUR_ACCOUNT# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
!Create Temp Directory :SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :SET &TEMP_DIR# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"&$RUNID#")
!Escape Temp Directory :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &TEMP_DIR# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CYBERARK_CONJUR.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX :SET &TEMP_DIR# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
mkdir &TEMP_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :PUBLISH &TEMP_DIR#,,TASK
!Password Decryption :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_CONJUR_PASSWORD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
!set enviroment variables export HOME=&TEMP_DIR# export CONJURRC=$HOME/./.conjurrc echo
!Initialize conjur :SET &INIT_CMD# = "conjur init -u &UC4RB_CONJUR_URL# -a &UC4RB_CONJUR_ACCOUNT#" echo "Conjur Initialization Command: &INIT_CMD#" echo "yes" | &INIT_CMD# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX echo
!Cnojur login :SET &LOGIN_CMD# = "conjur authn login -u &UC4RB_CONJUR_USERNAME# " echo "Conjur Login Command: &LOGIN_CMD#" &LOGIN_CMD# -p $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX echo
